page.title: 19Home Life
page.content: In my house live four people,my brother Carl,my Mum, Dad and me.I have a sister who is nineteen and has left home.We have a lot of pets like many of my friends;but some of my pets are unusual.We have an Afghan hound about 85 cm.high.We have three cats one of whom has a bad tail at the present. Beside these we have about a dozen birds of prey that my Dad keeps and one he shows.It is a Mountain Hawk Eagle and before he shows it he has to train it. We also have a ferret,a goat and three foxes. My Dad and I go stockcar racing at Skegness sometimes and he helps his friend build and repair his cars. { { { {Written by Luke Wilkinson,aged 11.
